http.title: SiteGround Web Hosting Server Default Page
http.html:
Oops! Website currently not available.

Nice of you to come by, but currently this web page is feeling a bit under the weather.

Why not check back later?

If you're the owner of this website , here are some possible explanations why you're seeing this page:

Purchased a Domain?

If you purchased a new domain, its DNS may not be pointed correctly.

Click here to learn more.

Made DNS Changes?

Then you might have to wait a while until they propagate.

Click here to learn more.

Installed SSL Recently?

If so, you should allow some time for the change to propagate.

Click here to learn more.

The web hosting service for this web page is provided by SiteGround.com.

Your Solution for Design-Build Remodeling in Ohio

When Pat and Dan Hurst founded Hurst Design-Build Remodeling in 1997, they set out with a simple goal: to be the best home remodeler in the Cleveland area.

To achieve their goal, the brothers knew that quality, creativity and client care were the keys to success. “Is there a better way to do this?” became their guiding principle. Even today, they are constantly seeking ways to improve Hurst’s level of quality from top to bottom.

When adding members to their team, the Hursts followed the same principle, ensuring that every new member had the same drive. Together, the entire Hurst team has developed a set of core values that maintain Dan and Pat’s pursuit of excellence.

By following these principles, Hurst’s award-winning team has helped hundreds of Northeast Ohio homeowners love their homes again, while becoming known for its high standards and earning peer recognition as an industry leader.

What Our Clients Say About Us
You can also visit our HOUZZ page to see what HOUZZ members are saying about Hurst Design-Build Remodeling.
Read our reviews on Houzz
Considering working with Hurst Remodeling? Now you can see what your neighbors are saying about the quality of our work. Click on the map to read reviews from your area.
Read our reviews on GuildQuality
Hurst Design-Build Remodeling
I feel I can judge the operation and their performance as I had been a tradesman and I was President of a highly successful Developer/Contractor for 32 years and I feel very qualified to make this assessment of their performance. I wouldn't hesitate to use them again if I were going to do more construction.
G.A.J.

Strongsville, OH
Hurst Design-Build Remodeling
I feel I can judge the operation and their performance as I had been a tradesman and I was President of a highly successful Developer/Contractor for 32 years and I feel very qualified to make this assessment of their performance. I wouldn't hesitate to use them again if I were going to do more construction.
G.A.J.

Strongsville, OH
Hurst Design-Build Remodeling
My new kitchen is a dream come true and everything I hoped for. Pat, Andy, Dan, and the rest of the crew were most helpful every step of the way to bring my dream to reality. Not a day goes by that I don't step back and say 'WOW'. I love it so much. If I had to move I would bring my kitchen with me.
Barbara

North Ridgeville, Ohio
Hurst Design-Build Remodeling
From the beginning the entire experience exceeded our expectations. The attention to detail and frequent communication made the difference to us. To sum it up your systemized approach to document all aspects of a job all the way through to the quality of your personnel and trade contractors made it a clear that we made the right decision in choosing Hurst.
Andrew & Judy

Parma, Ohio
Hurst Design-Build Remodeling
When I contracted with Hurst Design-Build-Remodeling to do this job, I had an idea yours was first-class operation. You did not disappoint me. From start to finish, the professionalism, attention to detail, courtesy and respect displayed to you, Dan, Andy, and Brian made it a pleasure to do business with you. The project turned out beautifully – just as I had envisioned.
Donna

Twinsburg, Ohio
Hurst Design-Build Remodeling
I am thoroughly impressed by the courteous & professional manner of this company. Besides being friendly, all of the employees were clean, quiet and respectful. The construction planning was detailed and very precise. We know exactly what was going to be done. Our home is over 120 years old, so I was surprised that the new construction looked so natural.
Brenda

Bratenahl, Ohio
Hurst Design-Build Remodeling
All praise to Dom and Dean! They did an efficient and fantastic job. Dom’s attention to detail and accuracy was outstanding. Dean was great and it’s hard to believe his a trainee. Both guys were polite and personable and very hard working. All the others were very polite and did their jobs well.
Tom and Connie

Cleveland, Ohio
Hurst Design-Build Remodeling
From the day we began working with Hurst, we felt that our addition was a project that belonged to us all. Hurst listened to what we wanted and needed from our addition and offered insightful suggestions along the way while remaining flexible to changes well into the project. Hurst’s commitment to excellent service sets their company above many others.
Sue and Ken

Brooklyn, Ohio
Hurst Design-Build Remodeling
We have worked with three other home remodeling companies, and Hurst impressed us by (1) actually calling us back, (2) coming to our home at the time scheduled for the job estimate, (3) having an estimate within one week, (4) starting the job when they said they would! You are by far the superior of the three previous builders.
Doug and Linda

Sagamore Hills, Ohio
Hurst Design-Build Remodeling
I’m clearly a satisfied customer – otherwise I wouldn’t have had Hurst back for the completion of our nursery over the garage. I’m extremely pleased with the finish work in the nursery project. In fact, I’d call the nursery project a “Home Run”. I would have no problem in using your team for future projects or recommending you to others. Thanks!!
Dave & Beth

Berea, Ohio
Hurst Design-Build Remodeling
Not only does the completed work bring a sense of satisfaction and adds to our overall well being, but also the experience of working with professional persons dedicated to the quality of their work and to the satisfaction of the customer was unique in today’s market place. We are pleased with our remodeled baths and grateful to have selected Hurst.
Maureen

Olmsted Falls Ohio
